DataElement.preferredName: Pediatric Revised Olweus Bully/Victim Questionnaire Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Having to do with children._A questionnaire consisting of 40 questions for the measurement of aspects of bully/victim problems: physical, verbal, indirect, racial, sexual forms of bullying harassment; initiation of various forms of bullying other students; where the bullying occurs; pro?bullying and pro?victim attitudes; and the extent to which teachers, peers, and parents are informed about and react to the bullying._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Having to do with children._A questionnaire consisting of 40 questions for the measurement of aspects of bully/victim problems: physical, verbal, indirect, racial, sexual forms of bullying harassment; initiation of various forms of bullying other students; where the bullying occurs; pro?bullying and pro?victim attitudes; and the extent to which teachers, peers, and parents are informed about and react to the bullying.

Property.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire consisting of 40 questions for the measurement of aspects of bully/victim problems: physical, verbal, indirect, racial, sexual forms of bullying harassment; initiation of various forms of bullying other students; where the bullying occurs; pro‐bullying and pro‐victim attitudes; and the extent to which teachers, peers, and parents are informed about and react to the bullying.

Concepts.definition: A questionnaire consisting of 40 questions for the measurement of aspects of bully/victim problems: physical, verbal, indirect, racial, sexual forms of bullying harassment; initiation of various forms of bullying other students; where the bullying occurs; pro-bullying and pro-victim attitudes; and the extent to which teachers, peers, and parents are informed about and react to the bullying.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21
